overview: Buckleroos Part 2 continues in this hardcore sequel that will have you barking at the moon! Follow Dean Phoenix, Marcus Iron, and Owen Hawk as they continue the Western journey along with their hot and big dicked co-stars such as Dave Angelo, Hank Locklear, and Jason Kennedy. In the biggest scene of the year Marcus Iron teaches two young missionaries the in’s and out’s of man-on-man action. Timmy Thomas and Sammy Case co-star. And don’t forget Zak Spears, who stars as the Man in Black (non-sexual role).
title: BuckleRoos 2
